name: Pervigile
description:
Pervigile is a survival horror game inspired by PS1 horror games.

Story You've just moved into an old rented house, and you'll have to live there alone for a week. Your girlfriend will move in with you, but not until the beginning of next week.

Live alone for seven days until your loved one arrives.

But remember, the house is old and there are stories of strange things that happened inside with the former tenants...

This demo will take place on one of the days of the week! Controls

WASD to Move

Mouse to Look around

E to interact

F to Flashlight

TAB to toggle objetives
